Through the sttorm of shots, Tyrael got hit by many shots, but was 
still operational. Burrock, on the other hand, received many shots 
throughout him and his acidic gland got blown up. The result, however, 
was more dire.

The worm-like robot, started tilting forward and fell on the ground, 
in the midst of battle. Then, he started bulging up, chemical 
reactions inside him tearing the techno-organic tissues and circuits 
apart, then frying the whole body. The tripredacus finally exploded 
with a forceful blast, spraying sharpnels, flesh and a lot of acid on 
everyone around the base.

Seeing his new warrior die so prematurously, Tyrael got angry. He 
transformed to phoenix mode, grabbed the remains of Burrock and flew 
up high.

Tyrael: Tripredacus! We retreat now! You shall see more of me, 
Megatron! Few have ever escaped me, and you will not be one of them!

He started flashing, his light glowing brighter and brighter, until it 
became like a sun a few meters from the base. This would perfectly 
cover the retreat...
